title: Digital Literacy and Academic Language Competency Enhancement Program for Vulnerable Migrant Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Self-directed learning environments leveraging the expertise of pre-service/in-service teachers, with flexible BYOD-based learning approaches

learning_goals: Learners can perform required language functions in academic reading/writing/listening/speaking contexts with over 80% accuracy
Learners can independently execute the process of creating and sharing instructional design materials using digital collaboration tools over three times
Learners can select academic materials by applying digital resource evaluation criteria and explain how to utilize them according to CC license regulations
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
